Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #70 Division Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Oak, Clark, Walton, and resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Allow extra travel time.

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Drexel, 51st, Woodlawn, 47th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near #47 47th/Drexel.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp & 151 Sheridan buses temp. rrtd via Sheridan, Bryn Mawr, Broadway & Foster, due to fire department activity at Sheridan/Catalpa

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Bryn Mawr, Broadway and Foster, due to fire department activity near Sheridan/Catalpa.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/112th Place
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie,111th, Pulaski and 115th: due to street blockage near Kedzie/112th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 111th, Pulaski, 115th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/112th Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near
ShortDescription: SB 146 Inner LS/Mchgn Exp buses temp rrtd via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway & Foster, due to fire department activity at Sheridan/Catalpa

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway and Foster, due to fire department activity near Sheridan/Catalpa.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Sheridan/Catalpa
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway & Foster, due to fire department activity at Sheridan/Catalpa

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway and Foster, due to fire department activity at Sheridan/Catalpa.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
